articles.title: Ousmane Dembele pens a new two-year Barcelona deal to end speculation linking him with Chelsea move - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 25-year-old, who was briefly a free agent, after seeing his original deal with the Catalan giants expire at the end of last month will now remain at the LaLiga giants.
articles.content:
Barcelona have announced Ousmane Dembele has agreed a new contract until the summer of 2024, bringing an end to months of transfer speculation.
